name: Jurassic Dino Racing Challenge 3D Full
description:
Jurassic Dino Racing Challenge 3D is a great chance to participate the unusual racing tournament with the most famous primal creatures – dinosaurus! Show that you can win the ride and collect all achievements and medals! Choose one of these unusual mounts – Velociraptor, Tyrannosaurus, Spinosaurus and other – and become the champion of hurdling tournament!

Watch these primal beasts are waiting for race – and it’s not ordinary horses! Choose Velociraptor, Tyrannosaurus, Spinosaurus or other dinosaur to ride on and become a winner of the hurdles with Jurassic Dino Racing Challenge 3D!

Try your dino riding skills at two racing disciplines – enduring ride and jumping race! Don’t miss the chance to play very attractive and unusual derby simulator. Earn money to buy new dinosaur or to raise up its characteristics. Enjoy the unusual riding contest with Jurassic Dino Racing Challenge 3D and choose the fastest primal reptilian predator!

Jurassic Dino Racing Challenge 3D features:

- Many primal dinos to ride on – Velociraptor, Tyrannosaurus, Spinosaurus and other
- Two challenging game modes - enduring ride and jumping race
- Realistic riding obstacles and racing condition for all the fans of hurdles tournaments
- Simple and intuitive controls

Don’t lose your chance to plunge into the primal world with our Jurassic Dino Racing Challenge 3D. It’s a great app for all riding simulator funs. Show that you can win the ride and collect all achievements and medals!
